TopicTitle: [1.2] UAL002's Lorefriendy Serious Parody Flags v2.1 [Fall of the Ape Edition]

Articles.Content:
This is basically a flag pack that is expected to grow. No real world flags are intended for this pack. Only fictional flags with a serious or parody nature will be added in the future. If that's all you need to know, go ahead and download. For the rest of you who want lore explanations, read on.  The bios included with the flags are pretty goofy!

Installation:

Merge the included Gamedata folder with your current Kerbal Space Program's or if you use a modloader of some sort, I can assume you know where this goes.

Idea:

KSC is the one premier launch site on Kerbin. With its perfect equatorial location, Kerbal Nations all come together to command and launch from KSC on a regular basis. Command of the facility rotates through all the cooperating nations on a regular basis. In addition, non-command nations and corporations are regularly permitted to launch from KSC. I intended for none of this to be offensive, merely humorous so please provide some feedback. If you have ideas for flags or see any missing bios or flag names you would like to submit, post away.

Flags:

Album (Cant figure out how to embed)

Great for use with StarVisions Flag decal Mod

Great for use with blackheart612's Decal Stickers

Changelog:

v.034.5.9 Release

v.04 Added 3 flags and their bios. Skotslund, Anglelund, Unified Nation-states of Kerbin

v.05 Added 4 Flags and 2 bios. Woolsh, Squexico, Yitalia, Kippon.

v.06 Corrected sizes

v.07 Added flags for UKKR, Kanada, Krussia and 1 unnamed. Imgur album used to display. Various bios and credits added there.

v1.0 Added Kienar Fleet Systems to Agents along with the New Tuak Drive Yards. Should show up as contract givers now. Hopefully. As always completely remove the old mod as the file structure has changed.

v1.2 Added 2 new flags, Republiko Brasilo and Duskgaze. Added a bio and name for Yaeger.

v1.3 Added 2 new flags, Ishmael and Polan. Added a bio for Republico Brasilo

v1.35 Added License and readme.

v1.4 Kommonwealth update. Unified Kerbdom, Kaustralia, Kireland, Krussland and updated Republico Brasilo flags added.

v1.5 Added 4 roundels for the following nations. UKKR, UNK, UK, and the Cratery Coast. Great for use with StarVisions

v1.6 Added 1 new flag, Erryday. Added 6 roundels for the following nations. Kippon, Kanada, Erryday, Polan, Ishmael, NKO.

v1.7 Added 2 new flags, Goryeo and Kompletish. Added 2 new roundels for the same countries.

v1.7.1 Removed UAL flag as a test of the github/CKAN update ability. Seems to work.

v1.8 Retouched Kermania, Krease, Yaeger, Merkan, Kinland and Kerralstran. Added flags Loekeyah and Skaibern.

v1.9 Added roundels for Skaibern, Loekeyah and Arabnia. Added flag for Arabnia. New "Ancient Kerbal" font used. The font is called Marain and can be found HERE

v2.0 Added flags for Krankia, South Kijani, and Silverta

v2.1  Defunct Squexio flag replaces original. New Republiko Simios flag takes its place.

License

Free to use personally. Hit me up before adding it to any of your own work if you don't mind. (If you don't hear from me in a timely manner assume its OK.)

Kerbalstuff: REDACTED

Github: Download page

Kerblakistan! Radical Kerbals from the desert that wish to go to space like any other nation. They have a rich history the dates back to before history was written.

Kanada!

The Kanadians are known as friendly Kerbalfolk, generally liked (except for their obnoxious pop singer Justin Kieber). They have a tendency to add ", keh?" to every sentence. Kanada bankrolls their space program with the export of highly regarded Kaple Syrup, although the extraction of Kethane out of northern "Kethane Sands" grounds has added a new (environmental) dynamic to this peaceful part of Kerbin.

It's one small step for a Kerbal, but it's one giant leap for Kerbalkind, keh?
Ill second the Kanada one!!

Not entire sure I can endorse all the K-nations, but the flags look interesting at least.

Not bad.

Submission:

The People's Republic of Kalifornia-

A nation that believes in the abolition of money and use of "roots" for recreation. They seceeded from the UNSK as soon as a single DPRK representative entered the country and immediately adopted Kermunism as their government. Instead of funds, they pay you in "roots". Unfortunately, the country is completely bankrupt in multiple ways. However, everyone is too "rooted" to notice this.
